pageTitle: Dolce Vita Dot Print Romper | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Inseam: 1.5in / 4cm MEASUREMENTS * Belt sold separately. Imported. Wash cold. 100% cotton. Fabric: Twill. A retro polka-dot print gives this twill romper a sweet pop of vintage appeal. A smocked elastic panel details the snug bodice, which is finished with a sweetheart neckline. Structured pleats camouflage the slant hip pockets at the front, and patch pockets outfit the back. Description Sale > Dolce Vita > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Every pair of Dolce Vita shoes embodies the meaning of the brand’s name: “the good life.” Van Lamprou and Nick Lucio launched Dolce Vita in 2001 with the young, the restless, and the glamorous as their muse. In 2014, Dolce Vita was acquired by Steve Madden, which has preserved the label’s go-to appeal for the fun, modern girl.
